vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.23;
son of: Aaron (H0175) and Elisheba (H0472);
brother of: Nadab (H5070), Abihu (H0030) and Eleazar (H0499)
§ Ithamar = "coast of palms"
fourth and youngest son of Aaron
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Aarón; sacerdote; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以他瑪 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "棕櫚岸"
亞倫的第四個兒子 (亦是其幼子)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以他玛 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "棕榈岸"
亚伦的第四个儿子 (亦是其幼子)
